9030 CLS:DIMR$(86):GOSUB9100:W$(0)=CHR$(128)+CHR$(128):W$(1)=CHR$(175)+CHR$(175)
9035 FORQ=0TO86:CLS0:PRINT@24,"ROOM"Q;
9050 FORC2=0TO4:C3=C2*64+94:FORC1=2TO8:C3=C3+2:C4=VAL(MID$(R$(Q),C2*8+C1,1)):PRINT@C3,W$(C4);:PRINT@C3+32,W$(C4);:NEXT:NEXT
9055 IFINKEY$=""THEN9055
9060 NEXTQ
9070 CLS:END
